p: Resveratrol (RSV), a flavonoid found on the skin of grapes, and related compounds have been shown to activate BAT and increase thermogenesis ( Andrade et al., 2014; Ku et al., 2016; Li et al., 2017) likely through AMPKÎ± activation ( Wang et al., 2017). A combination of RSV with Quercetin, active compound from onion peels ( Arias et al., 2017), and pentamethyl quercetin (PMQ) ( Han Y. et al., 2017) was shown to induce BAT activation and browning.
